mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.ass_id AS "ass.id", a.content, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.status, ass.name As "ass.name"
LEFT JOIN ass ass ON ass.id = a.ass_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM activity a
WHERE a.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY a.name LIMIT ${(page.pageNo - 1) * page.pageSize}, ${page.pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity( id, name, ass_id, content, start_time, status, end_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{ass.id}, #{content}, #{startTime}, #{status}, #{endTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET name = #{name}, ass_id = #{ass.id}, content = #{content}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
